data.title: Tom Hanks and Robin Wright Reunite Again in the Film Here, by Director Robert Zemeckis!
data.meta_description: NOBARTV NEWS Robin Wright and Tom Hank will reunite to star in a drama film entitled Here, by director Robert Zemeckis.
data.meta_site_name: NOBARTV.CO.ID - Kabar Berita & Komunitas Fans Bola
data.text:
NOBARTV NEWS Robin Wright and Tom Hank will reunite to star in a drama film entitled Here, by director Robert Zemeckis.

Previously, Robert Zemeckis worked on a drama film entitled Forrest Gump starring Tom Hanks and Robin Wright.

After successfully telling a touching story through Forrest Gump, the three of them will reunite in another drama film entitled Here.

Here itself released its official trailer in July 2024 and invited many positive comments.

What is the synopsis of the story and when is the broadcast schedule for Tom Hank and Robin Wright's latest film? Come on, look at the following information.

Story Synopsis

The film Here tells the story of a long journey that took place on a piece of land and the stories that happened to the people on that land.

Starting from the past to the present, starting from a forest without inhabitants until finally standing a sturdy house.

Setting The camera in the film Here also doesn't move, it stays at the same point without zooming in or even zooming out.

This is an interesting value for a film directed by director Robert Zemeckis.

When does filming start?

Tom Hank and Robin Wright's latest film is actually adapted from a novel entitled Here by Richard McGuire.

The process of adapting and producing the film was first announced in February 2022 with Playtone and ImageMovers as producers.

Meanwhile, Eric Roth serves as scriptwriter and Robert Zemeckis as director.

After being appointed as director for this latest drama film, Zemeckis asked Tom Hank to be the main actor.

Then TriStar Pictures, through Sony Pictures, succeeded in winning distribution rights for the United States.

Meanwhile, international releases will be distributed by Miramax as an international sales agent.

After the investor announcement, actress Robin Wright was chosen as the main character accompanying Tom Hank.

The announcement was followed by the joining of Paul Bettany and Kelly Reilly in September.

Then in February 2023 Leslie Zemeckis, Michelle Dockery and Gwilym Lee joined the cast.

The film Here reunites Hank and Wright, who previously played roles in Zemeckis' film Forrest Gump.

In the film Forrest Gump, Tom Hanks and Robbin Wright play childhood sweethearts who present a story full of emotion and touching.

The announcement of the reunion of the two actors made many fans eagerly awaiting the film Here.

The good news is that the film Here has started shooting in January 2023 at Pinewood Studios.

This film uses the latest artificial intelligence or generative AI technology called Metaphysical Live.

With the latest AI technology, actors can swap faces and make them look younger instantly when performing.

Therefore, in the official trailer, Hank looks younger thanks to AI technology which does not need additional post-production processing methods to make him look younger.

Show Schedule

The film is scheduled to be released theatrically in cinemas by TriStar Pictures through Sony Pictures Releasing on November 1, 2024.

Initially, this film will premiere in Los Angeles and New York on November 15, 2024.

This initial release plan will be followed by a limited release in the United States on November 22 2024 and then it will be distributed more widely on November 27 2024.

However, in June 2024, Sony Pictures Releasing moved the broadcast schedule from release to November 15 2024.

Then in August, Sony moved the broadcast schedule again and moved it forward two weeks to November 1, 2024.

Meanwhile, Miramax has not made an announcement regarding the international release schedule for the film Here.
